Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

Today it's my unfortunate task to inform everyone here that Miguel a.k.a. Maxmaps will be leaving Squad this Friday after more than two years of working on the game, bringing a wealth of knowledge and passion to the game's development. We'd like to thank Max for the dedication with which he tackled his ever growing workload. It's safe to say that without Max's input we'd be in a very different place right now, as he played a positive and instrumental role in the development process.

We will miss having him around and wish him the best of luck in the future.

On behalf of everyone at Squad,

Kasper

Thanks Kasper. You all be nice to Dr_Turkey, okay?

One could not ask for a better job experience and a better community than Kerbal Space Program has. So, from the bottom of my heart, thank you.

Thanks Kasper. You all be nice to Dr_Turkey, okay?

One could not ask for a better job experience and a better community than Kerbal Space Program has. So, from the bottom of my heart, thank you.

i wish you well mr max, god speed
Wow, end of an era! Farewell dude
Thank you for all you have done and then some
Goodbye, Max! Thank you for everything you have done to this wonderful game!

As you make your way into whatever the future holds, Maxmaps...

I'd like to thank you for all you have done with KSP. I hope you realize how incredible this game has been, and how many people have been inspired and amazed by what it has to offer. This is a great game, and it wouldn't have been a great game without you.

Stay awesome. I wish you the best of luck on whatever you decide to do next. And once again, thank you so much.

-Upsilon

Goodbye Max! I will miss you on Squadcast each week

Best of luck in your future endeavors!
Whaaaaaa?! This came out of nowhere... Leaving on good terms, I hope. Best of luck for the future, Mr Maps!

I'm sad to see you go, Miguel. I can't thank you enough for your support in this game. But good luck and farewell, I'm sure great opportunities await you.

Now what's going to happen to Squadcast with max?
I will miss you very much, Maxmaps. You have served the game and its fans well. Thanks so much for what you've done for the game.
Best of wishes for your future endeavors...

One hopes that if Max isn't working on the game, he'll be able to spend more time playing the game!

Thank you Maxmaps for your work. God bless your future endeavours.

Peace.

Damn Max, that was unexpected !

Wish you the best, will miss your fails on TwitchTV ... really ^^

Also nice to hear it isn't EA nor UBI who take the role of producer for KSP
Godspeed. Fair skies and following seas.

Leaving in the absolute best of terms, of course.

Dr_Turkey will be taking over Squadcast!

You say taking over, I say GLORIOUS CONQUEST.

Leaving in the absolute best of terms, of course.

Dr_Turkey will be taking over Squadcast!

Best wishes in your future endeavors, Max. You will be missed.

Happy landings!

I, for one, would like to welcome our new Dr_Turkey overlord.

Farewell and good luck Maxmaps, we will miss you!!

And welcome Dr_Turkey!
Thank you so much time Max for the time you worked on improving the game, leading to the most awesome game I've ever played. Thank you. A big welcome to our new developer Dr_Turkey!
Farewell and thank you, Maxmaps! You will be missed!

Noooooooo! I have to say that I struggled a bit to get in to KSP in the beginning after I first bought it, around 0.17, but after I discovered first Scott Manley's YouTubes and then Max's Squadcasts everything really opened up for me. I'll miss our Friday nights together Miguel. Vaya con Dios!
Well, that's unexpected. All the best for the future Max, thanks for all your hard work. And welcome Dr_Turkey.
Good luck in whatever your new endeavor is!
Thank you Miguel for all the work you did for KSP. Best of luck to you!!
